dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, settlements, soldiers; shows Jerusalem under siege by Nebuchadnezzar as described in the Book of Kings, chapter 25.
"T. II. P. 317. 2.er pl." -- top right margin ; "4. Reg. XXV.4" -- title area.
Various sites lettered throughout map; no key present.
Appears in Calmet's Dictionarium, historicum, criticum, chronologican, sacrae scripturae. London, 1725, vol. II.
